name: 2-to-1 MUX
description: Create a 2-to-1 multiplexer: select between two data inputs based on select signal
fullDescription: The multiplexer (MUX) is a data selector. It chooses one of multiple inputs and forwards it to the output. A 2-to-1 MUX has two data inputs (D0, D1), one select input (S), and one output. When S=0, output equals D0; when S=1, output equals D1. MUXes are everywhere in CPUs - used for data routing, ALU input selection, and building complex logic. You can build it using AND, OR, and INV gates.
